content: jingle the christmas elf - amigurumi doll crochet pattern free pattern https //neogurumi blogspot com/2022/10/jingle-christmas-elf html pdf version with photos https //neogurumi etsy com/listing/1568313914 materials 3 25mm hook worsted weight yarn - 100 yards red 30 yards white 40 yards skin tone 30 yards brown suggested yarn hobby lobby s i love this cotton in the colors red white brown and warm blush skin tone 8mm safety eyes blush size approximately 12 inches tall when made with the suggested yarn and hook size the photographs and pattern contained in this document are property of © jessica doering & © neogurumi no unauthorized reproduction or distribution of this pattern or content in whole or in part is permitted you are free to sell any finished items made with this pattern but please give credit when doing so a link back to the pattern page is appreciated any additional questions regarding the use of the pattern publication please send an email to neogurumi@gmail com copyright 2017 jessica doering neogurumi
